name: Heathrow
0:
”Alexa, open Heathrow.”
”Alexa, ask Heathrow about flight VS003.”
”Alexa, ask Heathrow about flight British Airways 032.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: heathrow
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Find the latest updates for flights departing or arriving at London Heathrow Airport.

With the Heathrow skill for Alexa you can check on flights today, tomorrow or even further ahead.

Just say “flight”, followed by your flight number. Alexa will confirm the details and tell you the most recent status update for your flight.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
